content.rendered:
Product Sourcing Services

We Are Your One-stop
China Product Sourcing Company

Having trouble finding the product you want in China? MatchSourcing can help source and import any products for your business. Take advance of versatile our expert product sourcing services.

Amazon & Shopify Product Sourcing

Have any trouble with sourcing products to sell on Amazon & Shopify? Our sourcing expertise will assist you in locating marketable products to fulfill your ecommerce demands, whether they are pricing, material, quantity, certification, or manufacturing specifications.

Working with our product sourcing team, you can focus on increasing revenue, researching niche markets, and improving the ability to access new clients. 

China Wholesale Product Sourcing

If you wish to source items wholesale or locate a manufacturer in China, MatchSourcing can assist you. Our customer service representatives are committed to assisting you in sourcing high-quality, dependable product sources.

Our specialists can put you in touch with the top China wholesale suppliers for trade. We deal with China wholesale suppliers on your behalf and can assist you in having your items purchased or even offer dropshipping services.

China custom product Design & Manufacturing

Do you need OEM/ODM products at a reasonable price to make your brand stand out in the competitive market? A qualified Chinese manufacturer is your best choice.

Our China sourcing specialists can help you evaluate the capabilities of China factories and offer several candidate supplier. With that, we are able to meet your needs in custom products sourcing and manufacturing. 

Benefits of Our Product Sourcing Service

At MatchSourcing, we make importing from China simple. By working with us you will get these services and benefits:

Low MOQ

We do not have high barriers to minimum order quantity (MOQ). Whatever the size of your order, we aim to locate the greatest goods and satisfy all of your needs.

Diverse Product Sourcing

Thanks to the Chinese manufacturing industry and our suppliers with long-term partnerships, we can source any type of products from multiple vendors to save you time.

Transparent Price

You will get the factory price and pay commission based on the transparent purchase amount and services. There are no hidden fees added to your order.

Strict Quality Control

You don't have to be concerned about product quality before shipment since we assist you in conducting product quality inspections to ensure a smooth delivery.

Free and Fast Quote

We obtain several quotations from reputable vendors. Our convincing salesperson will negotiate on your behalf to achieve the highest quality at the lowest possible price.

Short Lead Time

We will monitor the production process for you once your order has been submitted. You can count on honest comments in real-time and on-time delivery.

Products We Sourced

Furniture

We locate numerous vendors in China selling the same items at varying prices and quality for each style of garden, living room, and more. We are able to assist our customers balance price and quality by sourcing using our supply chain knowledge, increasing profit margins and efficiency.

Home Decor Products

We can assist you in sourcing high-quality home décor manufacturers in China. From sample order to production follow-up and shipping, we can help handle all details in China to deliver your target home déco products at a profitable price and a short lead time.

Clothes & Fabric

Sourcing fabric, trimmings, and clothing is one of the most valuable services our company can provide to our customers. We make it possible to dispatch good clothing on time and at a reasonable price.

Underwear

As a professional clothing China sourcing agency, we know everything there is to know about underwear & lingerie manufacturers in China, including industrial clusters, supplier certification, design modification possibilities, and potential sourcing concerns.

Watches

We are certain that we can source watches you need thanks to our supply network of Chinese watch manufacturers and wholesalers. For OEM and ODM watch projects, we can also find the most suitable factories to develop and produce your watch products.

Toys

We assist customers in mitigating supply chain risk, lowering production costs, and reducing the stress and strain associated with locating new toy and board game producers. We collaborate with over 60 of the world’s biggest toy manufacturers.

Jewelry

MatchSourcing can easily discover jewelry products and compare offers by aggregating listings from thousands of diamond, gemstone, jewelry wholesalers and makers. Ease your business of jewelry importing from China.

Handbags

MatchSourcing can obtain the best rates for handbags straight from Chinese producers. We provide free goods storage for most bag providers for 60 days and do an inspection to verify the quality of the created product.

Plastic Products

Where do you get all of the plastic you need for your products, regardless of industry? To stay up with the speed of your business operations, we help source plastic products timely and manage the quality.

Mobile Accessories

We provide you the one-stop sourcing services of mobile accessories from purchase to shipment. We are devoted to assisting companies in importing from China as a competent sourcing agency.

Pet Supplies

As pets become more pampered members of the family, the possibility for selling pet items grows exponentially. So take advantage of the chance to source pet products in China, which MatchSourcing can greatly assist you with.

Electronics

At the start of the purchasing process, our engineers and buyers will thoroughly evaluate your bill of materials (BOM) and use expertise to ensure you have access to high-quality electrical components.

Car Accessories

We provide strategic sourcing, supply chain management, and quality management services to assist car accessories clients in streamlining their OEM & ODM sourcing process in China.

Lights

We can manage all supplier-related work on your behalf, expediting the process of obtaining your lights from manufacturers to your warehouse, assisting you to enhance efficiency and decrease costs.

How to Work with
MatchSourcing’s Product Sourcing

You tell us the needs of designs, specifications, quantities, lead time, and others.

We research and source the right products with our supply network and sourcing skills.

We offer suppliers and pricing to compare after the vendor evaluation.

We contact and negotiate with suppliers/vendors on your behalf.

We offer multiple logistics solutions to ensure cost-effective and on time shipping.

We offer free consulting on import and export and help handle all details.
